data.title: Update utils::getTimeInMilliseconds()
data.body:
My device android samsung s4 bad result, The iPhone is a good result.

'return tv.tv_sec \* 1000 + tv.tv_usec / 1000;'
The result comes across as negative.
So I added the (long long).

data.title: Fix callfunc released with retained data (callback, target, extradata) issue
AudioEngine performance issue on Android
data.body: AudioEngine has performance issue on Android, and there are some discussion in #15652 . There is a corresponding PR for it #15875. It is in progress.

data.title: cocosstudio can manage TexturePacker Image.
data.body:
Hi.

I want to use TexturePacker and cocosstudio because it is less memory.
But now it cannot.
I fixed it.

Thanks.

data.title: Fix getSubStringOfUTF8String bug
data.body:
Hello, this pull request addresses the `ui::Helper::getSubStringOfUTF8String` issue raised here:
http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/problem-with-utf-strings/30461

I think we should not handle a raw utf-8 string without unicode-specific third-party library/implementation (such as LLVM's `ConvertUTF` and UTF8-CPP etc.) for maintenance or security reasons. So this changeset simply replaces with a code using `StringUtils::UTF8ToUTF32`, and adds a new test case.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

data.title: `cocos package list` doesn't include any VR packages
data.body: When executing `cocos package list` we don't have any VR packages listed yet. We are deploying v3.12 in one day and VR is included, yet we don't let the user install it. I can't write this piece for the docs without telling the user how to install it.

data.title: `cocos package list` wants to update SDKBOX and packages are not in alphabetical order.
data.body:
When executing `cocos package list`:
- first, it wants to update SDKBOX and this doesn't need to happen when just listing out what packages a user can install.

``` sh
$ cocos package list
A newer version of SDKBOX is available, would you like to update v1.0.0.9 to v1.0.0.13?
Type [Y]es, [n]o or [q]uit
```
- second, the packages are not in any order that is easy for the user to understand and see what they can install (i.e alphabetical)

``` sh
 share
     v2.2.3.5
         cocos2d-x v2.x (available)
         cocos2d-x v3.x (available)
```

data.title: Design Resolution broken after minimize window on win32
data.body:
After minimize window design resolution sets to window size. This can cause problems if design resolution does not equal to frame size. Sample code

`glview = GLViewImpl::createWithRect("MyGame", Rect(0, 0, 1280, 720));`
`director->setOpenGLView(glview);`
`glview->setDesignResolutionSize(640, 360, ResolutionPolicy::FIXED_WIDTH);`

Before minimize `Director::getInstance()->getVisibleSize()` will return 640x360, after 1280x720.

data.title: PageView::setCurrentPageIndex triggers PageView::EventType::TURNING
data.body: When `PageView::setCurrentPageIndex` is called the event `PageView::EventType::TURNING` is triggered

data.title: Fix some minor typos in local variable names
data.body:
This PR fixes some minor typos in local variable names, and doesn't break backward compatibility.
Thanks!
